channel.title: Melee attack of soldiers deal no damage
channel.description:
Hi, I already used the search funtion with the key words "soldier melee" but didn't found anything like that. So I hope that it wasn't reported yet :slight_smile:
Here are a few pictures I shot in a row where a soldier is attacking me with the stock of his gun. Badly it seems to has no effect :frowning:
[url=https://www7.pic-upload.de/18.09.12/1hbwgdqgmbt.jpg]![](upload://j5sNead0WfMgfQihbLaumfgPkgm.gif)[/url]
[url=https://www7.pic-upload.de/18.09.12/84eijdpg1jf.jpg]![](upload://j5sNead0WfMgfQihbLaumfgPkgm.gif)[/url]
[url=https://www7.pic-upload.de/18.09.12/hcys1mofnlp.jpg]![](upload://j5sNead0WfMgfQihbLaumfgPkgm.gif)[/url]
[url=https://www10.pic-upload.de/18.09.12/nvubdeixrkn.jpg]![](upload://mUBv8zS9sUo0KH0ynrMtgkKAdGT.jpeg)[/url]
[url=https://www10.pic-upload.de/18.09.12/zs8jdjb21bu1.jpg]![](upload://fO3ks22GWq4ejUJsuRAZQJoS4eS.jpeg)[/url]
I already know such behaviour from STALKER SOC and the Telepath which has no melee attack. So it is no big deal for me but I still wanted to mention it if it isn't already known.
Cheers and thx for this remake :smiley:

item.title: Melee attack of soldiers deal no damage
item.dc:creator: Gorin
item.description:
Ok…
I just tried it again on another soldier and there I got a nice punch from him.

Maybe this here was a special situation since I got trough the door which can be seen right and he stand there and immediately started to punch me.
Could be possible that i wasn’t in melee range yet but the AI didn’t realize that.

But it seems working well on every other soldier I forced to melee yet

Read full topic
item.source: Melee attack of soldiers deal no damage

item.title: Melee attack of soldiers deal no damage

item.description:
Hi,
I already used the search funtion with the key words “soldier melee” but didn’t found anything like that.
So I hope that it wasn’t reported yet

Here are a few pictures I shot in a row where a soldier is attacking me with the stock of his gun.
Badly it seems to has no effect

I already know such behaviour from STALKER SOC and the Telepath which has no melee attack.
So it is no big deal for me but I still wanted to mention it if it isn’t already known.

Cheers and thx for this remake
